src_text: Ilyo balebomba ngaba NSA, balyafwilisheko ba Carter mu kubombela bwino pa milandu iikumine isonde lyonse, pamo nga Camp David Accords, mu 1978; ukuwamya ubwampano bwa US–China mu kupwa kwa myaka yamuma 1970; Ukwimina kwa Buteko bwa Iran, ukwalengele kube ukwikata kwaba nkole mu Iran, mu 1979; elyo no kusansa kwa calo ca Afghanistan kubena Soviet, mu 1979.
ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: It was a tumultuous time, with the NSA being exposed by Carter during a summit at Camp David in 1978; the normalization of US-China relations in the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis in Iran in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.

hyp_text: The wrestlers in the ring were struggling to hold their ground.

[Bemba]: Nangu cibefyo, abena Belgium pamo nabena Sitzerland bonse abalanda ici Fulenchi bafwile basambilile ici Fulenchi ilyo bali kuma sukulu, kanshi kuti bakwanisha ukumfwa ifyo ulelanda nangu cakuti wabomfya imipendele yaci Fulenchi iyaishibikwa isonde lyonse.

[Bemba]: Muma senchari ayapita, abantu balikuula bwino imansa pa mushili uwaimbawike uwamutentemuko ukuyafikafye naku tupili utwalolenkana na beemba.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Bemba]: Intamfu yama milundu (miles) ukufika kuli 800 aya Trans-Alaska Pipeline System eyaiselwe panuma yakusuuma kwa mufuta ayengi aya oilo ku kapinda ka kukulyo aka Fairbanks, ku Alaska.

[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

src_text: Imfumu iyatiinine sana iye shina lya Louis XVI, Namfumu Marie Antoinette, abana babo babili (Marie Theresse uwa myaka ikumi na umo (11) elyo na Louis-Charles uwamyaka ine pamo ne nkashi ya Mfumu, Mama Elizebeth, pa bushiku bwa 6 Ulusuba-lukalamba, 1789 balipatikishiwe ukubwelela ku Paris ukufuma ku Versailles ne bumba lya ba namayo ba pa mushika.
ref_text: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
hyp_text: The King and Queen Louis XVI, King Marie Antoinette, and their two children, Marie-Therese (11 years old) and Louis-Charles, were arrested by the National Assembly on October 6, 1789, in Paris, and taken from Versailles to the Tuileries Palace.

src_text: Ilingi ukwilula kwa technological determinism kwakwata imisango yakumwenamo ifintu ibili: ukuti ubuyantashi ubwa ifyakutukutatukuta ifine bukonka inshila iyacila pa ntambi nefya cifyalilwa, elyo nokuti ifyakutukutatukuta fyalikwata amaka yakupilibulako imikalile ya cifyalilwa ukucila ifyo ifisambilishiwa.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: The concept of technological determinism suggests that the development of technology is driven by the need to solve practical problems and improve people's lives, and that technology is shaped by the social and cultural context in which it is developed, rather than the other way around.

src_text: Kubena Australia, ilangulushi lya kofi iyabuuta’ lyeni kuli bena. ‘Espressoa’ yaba iyafita iipi, capuccino ipangwa iyaisulamo umukaka (tefolo iyo), elyo chayi yena ipeelwa umwabula umukaka.

hyp_text: In Australia, the coffee culture is very popular among the locals. 'Espresso' is what they drink, capuccino is served with a thick layer of foam (which is the best part), and tea is served with a tea bag.
